Sentencas: We report on the development and performance of diopside (CaMgSi2O6) based glass-ceramic (GC) sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ten glass compositions were prepared by various additions and substitutions of La2O3, Cr2O3 and B2O3 in diopside system.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structure of the glasses has been investigated by employing Si-29, Al-27 and B-11 MAS-NMR spectroscopy.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The crystallization kinetics of the glasses has been investigated using differential thermal analysis (DTA) while X-ray diffraction (XRD) in conjunction with Rietveld-RIR technique has been employed to quantify the amount of crystalline and amorphous phases in the GCs.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hot-stage microscopy (HSM) has been used to investigate the influence of La2O3 and B2O3 on the sintering behavior of the glass powders.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The joining and chemical interaction of the B2O3 and La2O3-containing glasses with Crofer22 APU and Sanergy HT (metallic interconnects for SOFC), has been investigated in humidified reducing atmosphere at SOFC operating temperature while the leak rate of GC sealants has been investigated using oxygen pump leak rate method.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The suitable sintering and crystallization behavior of the GCs along with good adhesion to interconnect alloys and low leak rate indicate that the investigated GCs are suitable candidates for further experimentation as SOFC sealants.
Titulo: Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
Development and performance of diopside based glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
